title: joson-c
body:
Hi there, I have been trying to install json-c package, which is a dependency of a software name zonation. while building, I face the following error. It is worth saying that I am using built-in package recipe of Spack to install this. I am using the docker container provided by Spack itself for learning, so the OS is Ubuntu 16.
